short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to make Netflix a more social experience by embedding comments and reactions into the video player

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShowTalk (beta) brings comments and reactions to Netflix.

 -- Pop-up comments/reactions appear in the top right at specific parts of the show (automatically disappear after 5 seconds)

 -- Compose your own with keyboard shortcuts ('c' for comment, 'r' for reactions)

 -- Time markers indicate when comments will show up (hover over them to see a preview)

 -- Customizable: quickly turn comments on/off with the toggle button in the player bar

 -- After show comments: engage in active discussion at the end of each episode or movie

 -- Filter who you see comments from: select specific Facebook friends

Try the beta version for free!



Disclaimer: Netflix is a registered trademark and is not affiliated with, nor does it endorse ShowTalk.
